column4: got video-hassles with etch2. question: is ubuntu good for web development (apache-localhost/php4-5,mysql,eclipse) ?
at least as good as etch, I'd say
you experienced in this field, if I may ask ?

web development? Not very. But given that Ubuntu accesses pretty much the same software as etch, with a slight edge as regards timeliness, I'd predict that you'd fare well. See also factoids (private message)
